languages.text: [Оглядеть залу] "Я рад{mf||а}, что мои слуги нашли достойное святилище для твоей брони".
[Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."
languages.original_text: [Оглядеть залу] "Я рад{mf||а}, что мои слуги нашли достойное святилище для твоей брони".

languages.text: [环顾房间]“我很高兴，我的仆人们为你的盔甲找到了合适的神龛。”
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [环顾房间]“我很高兴，我的仆人们为你的盔甲找到了合适的神龛。”

languages.text: [部屋を見渡す]「使用人たちがアーマーに相応しい神殿を見つけてくれてよかった」
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [部屋を見渡す]「使用人たちがアーマーに相応しい神殿を見つけてくれてよかった」

languages.text: [Recorrer la sala con la vista] «Me alegro de que mis sirvientes hayan encontrado un santuario adecuado para su armadura».
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [Recorrer la sala con la vista] «Me alegro de que mis sirvientes hayan encontrado un santuario adecuado para su armadura».

languages.text: [Examiner la salle] « Je suis {mf|ravi|ravie} que mes serviteurs aient trouvé un sanctuaire digne de votre armure. »
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [Examiner la salle] « Je suis {mf|ravi|ravie} que mes serviteurs aient trouvé un sanctuaire digne de votre armure. »

languages.text: [In der Kammer umsehen] "Es freut mich, dass meine Diener einen geeigneten Schrein für Eure Rüstung gefunden haben."
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [In der Kammer umsehen] "Es freut mich, dass meine Diener einen geeigneten Schrein für Eure Rüstung gefunden haben."

languages.text: [Odada etrafa bakın] "Hizmetkârlarımın, zırhına uygun bir mabet bulmuş olmasına sevindim."
languages.original_text: [Look around the chamber] "I am pleased that my servants found a fitting shrine for your armour."

traits.locale_text: [Odada etrafa bakın] "Hizmetkârlarımın zırhına uygun bir mabet bulmuş olmasına sevindim."
